remarks: Commonly used special case of ~ trlcoat .  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jul-2013.)
statement:
trlcoat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlcoat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcoat.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcoat.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcocnvat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( R ` F ) =/= ( R ` G ) ) -> ( R ` ( F o. `' G ) ) e. A ) $.
